Ingredients
 - 1 cup cornmeal (polenta flour or yellow cornmeal)
- 1 small spoon of butter
- 3 cups of boiling water
 - 1 small spoonful of salt
 How to prepare
 In a bowl, mix the flour with the water and salt and mix them very well.
 We raise the pot on the fire while continuing to stir until cooked and thicken the texture.
 Remove from the fire and pour into a mold and leave until completely cooled and frozen.
 With a knife, cut as desired.
 In a greased non-stick skillet, grill polenta on both sides.
 Served with sauteed vegetables and grilled chicken.
